bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin tui 陰㿉 , yin (i.e. scrotal) prominence-illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ju 橘：和劑局方治諸疝痛及內㿉，卵腫偏墜，或硬如石，或腫至潰， 有橘核丸，用之有效 , “To cure all types of elevation-illness with pain and internal prominence-illness , with unilateral swelling and collapse of the testicles, or hardening like a stone, or swelling until they burst, the Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 recipes list the pills with ju -pits. Their application is effective”. This is the only known appearance of the term 內㿉 in medical literature. Print versions of the Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 available today do not list “pills with ju -pits”. Such a recipe is listed only in Pu ji fang 普濟方 and YFLJ , both citing Zhu shi ji yan yi fang 朱氏集驗醫方 as the source. LSZ’s quoting of Tai ping hui min he ji Recipe book. Northern Song, ju fang 1107~1110. 太平惠民和劑局方 may be an error. Also, neither Pu ji fang 普濟方 nor YFLJ refer to 內㿉 , internal prominence-illness, but recommend the pills with ju -pits: 治四種㿗病 , “to cure the four types of breakdown disease”. 㿗病 is identical with the condition 陰㿉. Therefore one may assume that nei tui 內㿉 , internal prominence-illness, is identical with yin tui 陰㿉， yin (i.e. scrotal) prominence-illness.
